|commands = [[Eighth Army (United Kingdom)|Eighth Army]] 1942–1943
Allied [[21st Army Group]] 1943–1945
[[Chief of the Imperial General Staff]] 1946–1948
Deputy Supreme Commander Europe of [[NATO]] 1951–1958

snippet.source:
|battles = [[World War I]]
[[Anglo-Irish War]]
[[1936???1939 Arab revolt in Palestine|Arab Revolt in Palestine]]
[[World War II]]

|awards = [[Knight of the Order of the Garter|KG]] (1946){{London Gazette| issue=37807| startpage=5945| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=3 December 1946| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath|GCB]] (1945){{London Gazette| issue=37119| startpage=2935| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=8 June 1945| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath|KCB]] (1942){{London Gazette| issue=35782| startpage=4917| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=10 November 1942| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Order of the Bath|CB]] (1940){{London Gazette| issue=34893| startpage=4244| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=9 July 1940| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Distinguished Service Order|DSO]]
[[Mentioned in Despatches|MID]] (1915, 1917, 1917, 1918, 1919, 1939, 1943,{{London Gazette| issue=36065| startpage=2853| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=22 June 1943| accessdate=2009-10-24}} 1944{{London Gazette| issue=36327| startpage=258| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=11 January 1944| accessdate=2009-10-24}}))
[[Distinguished Service Medal (United States)|Distinguished Service Medal]] ([[United States|USA]]) (1947){{London Gazette| issue=37853| startpage=323| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=14 January 1947| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Legion of Merit|Legion of Merit (Chief Commander)]] (USA) (1943){{London Gazette|issue=36125|date=6 August 1943 |startpage=3579|endpage= |supp=y |accessdate=2008-08-01}}
[[Order of Victory]] ([[USSR]]) (1945){{London Gazette| issue=37138| startpage=3244| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=19 June 1945| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Croix de Guerre]] (France) (1919){{London Gazette| issue=31109| startpage=314| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=3 January 1919| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Order of the Elephant]] (Denmark) (1945){{London Gazette| issue=37204| startpage=3962| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=31 July 1945| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Order of George I|Order of King George I, Grand Commander]] (Greece) (1944){{London Gazette| issue=36569| startpage=2913| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=16 June 1944| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Virtuti Militari|Virtuti Militari V Class]] (Poland) (1944){{London Gazette| issue=36769| startpage=4963| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=27 October 1944| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Order of the White Lion|Order of the White Lion, Grand Cross]] (Czech.) (1947){{London Gazette| issue=37853| startpage=327| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=14 January 1947| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
Grand Cordon of the Seal of Solomon (Ethiopia) (1949){{London Gazette| issue=38571| startpage=1529| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=25 March 1949| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Order of Leopold II|Order of Leopold II, Grand Officer]] (Belgium) (1947){{London Gazette| issue=37853| startpage=324| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=14 January 1947| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
[[Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav|Order of St. Olav, Grand Cross]] (Norway) (1951){{London Gazette| issue=39282| startpage=3753| endpage=| supp=| linkeddate=10 July 1951| accessdate=2009-10-24}}

|laterwork =Colonel Commandant, Royal Tank Regiment
Colonel Commandant, Parachute Regiment ( -1956{{London Gazette| issue=40729| startpage=1504| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=9 March 1956| accessdate=2009-10-24}})
Representative Colonel Commandant, Royal Armoured Corps (1947{{London Gazette| issue=37983| startpage=2663| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=10 June 1947| accessdate=2009-10-24}}-1957{{London Gazette| issue=41182| startpage=5545| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=20 September 1957| accessdate=2009-10-24}})
Colonel Commandant, Army Physical Training Corps (1946{{London Gazette| issue=37589| startpage=2665| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=31 May 1946| accessdate=2009-10-24}}-1960{{London Gazette| issue=42240| startpage=24| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=30 December 1960| accessdate=2009-10-24}})
Colonel Royal Warwickshire Regiment(1947{{London Gazette| issue=37826| startpage=6236| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=20 December 1946| accessdate=2009-10-24}}-1963{{London Gazette| issue=43160| startpage=9424| endpage=| supp=y| linkeddate=15 November 1963| accessdate=2009-10-24}})
Deputy Lieutenant of Southampton (1958-){{London Gazette| issue=41599| startpage=166| endpage=| supp=| linkeddate=6 January 1959| accessdate=2009-10-24}}
